name: Lottie's River Run
description:
Can you help her find them?

In Lottie's River Run, you must navigate Lottie the Lotl through the underwater rivers of Lotl Land to retrieve her missing seashells.

But be careful; Fruit Frogs do not like being disturbed!

You'll find us here:

• Youtube • Patreon • Twitter •

• Instagram • Kickstarter • Shop •


 Lottie's River Run is a short and casual game. It's made in Godot and developed by Evy Benita and Alan Thorn.

Thank you a'lotl for playing. May the seashells be with you.

✨Android & iOS releases coming soon ✨
